name: JUST DASH
description:
JUST DASH! - This is a new HARDCORE platformer from a first person view. You have to run over obstacles in different ways. For example such as: running, vprisyadku, in the air or running on the walls! Beware of dangerous traps: lasers, jumps, flying cubes and more!

The game already offers 20 levels (2 chapters), but we plan to add more)
